hero.description: Empowering lives through support, connection, and understanding

about.title: About Yukti Trust
about.subtitle: A Movement, A Family, A Place Where No One Feels Alone

story.title: Our Story
story.content: To understand Yukti Trust, you first need to know about Yukti Vyas, the heart behind this initiative. She had almost everything in life, yet something was always missing—a grandparent's love, their care, their presence. As a child, this emptiness made her feel jealous and sad, and as she grew, it became a void in her heart—like a missing piece of a puzzle.
story.birth: That's where the idea of Yukti Trust was born.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: To ensure that no one—whether differently-abled, elderly, or orphaned—ever feels alone

goals.differently-abled-desc: Providing job opportunities, healthcare access, and emotional support for independent lives.
goals.elders-desc: Bringing companionship, virtual events, and healthcare resources to those in their golden years.
goals.orphans-desc: Offering education, mentorship, and skill development for a hopeful future.
goals.community-desc: Standing together as one family—supporting, guiding, and uplifting each other.
goals.world: Create a World Where Love Wins
goals.world-desc: Replacing loneliness with love, emptiness with purpose, and sorrow with hope.

specialGroups.title: Who We Serve
specialGroups.subtitle: At Yukti Trust, we work for three special groups

differently-abled.title: Differently-Abled Individuals
services: Job Assistance – Government and private jobs suited to abilities
Healthcare Support – Directory of healthcare policies
Emotional Support – Safe space for connection through video/text

elders.title: Elders
services: Virtual Events with orphanages, other homes, and young people
Life Stories platform for sharing experiences
Healthcare Assistance and free services directory
Community Support for help and conversation
Old Age Home Directory with preference matching

orphans.title: Orphans
services: Support Services for emotional and financial assistance

why.title: Why Yukti Trust?
why.content: Because everyone deserves love, care, and belonging—from the moment they are born till their final journey. We are here to fill the missing pieces in their lives and bring them the warmth of a family.
why.tagline: Yukti Trust – A Family Beyond Blood, A Bond Beyond Time
why.join: Join us in creating a world where Sneh (Love) is our strength, and Sena (Army) is our unity.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the passionate individuals behind Yukti Trust who work tirelessly to make a difference
